name: RPG Micro Adventures: Turkeys
description:
This is a VERY short game. My daughter wrote a school play for her class and she had a lot of fun with it, so I decided to turn it into a game! It's nothing special but it's her first game so I hope you enjoy it. 

Jeff, Bob, and Billy are living a wonderful life of a Turkey. Gobbling, eating, sleeping, pooping...that's about it. Life is good...but Thanksgiving is coming soon and they might be in for a surprise.
